pr_title: Upgrade Infinispan to the most recent stable version

timeline.message: Upgrade Infinispan to the most recent stable version

timeline.bodyText: is a 10.1.x client compatible with a 9.4.x server?
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText:
It should be: https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_data_grid/7.0/html/developer_guide/compatibility_between_server_and_hot_rod_client_versions
You can also configure the protocol level explicitly, if needed: https://access.redhat.com/webassets/avalon/d/red-hat-data-grid/8.0/api/org/infinispan/client/hotrod/configuration/package-summary.html
According to the Hotrod protocol documentation of Infinispan 10, Hotrod 2.9 (Infinispan 9.4) should still be possible with Hotrod 3.0 (Infinispan 10): https://infinispan.org/docs/stable/titles/hotrod_protocol/hotrod_protocol.html#hot_rod_protocol_2_9
replies.author: ctron
